paragraphs.body: This map features markers of known locations in the ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: This map features markers of known locations in the Avatar World.

paragraphs.body: The known lands in the ${link_0} are shown here. Locations of certain landmarks are marked down and each marking are as follows. If you wish to view the file in its full size, click the "i" in the bottom left corner of the map.
paragraphs.text: The known lands in the World of Avatar are shown here. Locations of certain landmarks are marked down and each marking are as follows. If you wish to view the file in its full size, click the "i" in the bottom left corner of the map.

source.title: Map of the World of Avatar
